# rivestack_cluster (Data Source)

Use this data source to read information about an existing Rivestack HA PostgreSQL cluster.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "rivestack_cluster" "example" {
  id = "42"
}

output "cluster_host" {
  value = data.rivestack_cluster.example.host
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Cluster ID.

### Read-Only

- `connection_string` (String, Sensitive) Full PostgreSQL connection string.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `db_name` (String) Default database name.
- `db_password` (String, Sensitive) Default database user password.
- `db_type` (String) Cluster type (ha or core_solo).
- `db_user` (String) Default database user.
- `health_status` (String) Cluster health status.
- `host` (String) Cluster hostname.
- `name` (String) Display name.
- `node_count` (Number) Number of nodes.
- `postgresql_version` (Number) PostgreSQL major version.
- `region` (String) Cluster region.
- `server_type` (String) Server size.
- `status` (String) Cluster status.
- `tenant_id` (String) Unique tenant identifier.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
